item.title: 消息人士称，邮轮运营商维京的首次公开募股价格在15.4亿美元的范围内
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，邮轮运营商维京控股公司周二将其首次公开募股定价定在了每股 24 美元的目标范围内。【原文：Cruise operator Viking Holdings priced its initial public offering within its targeted range at $24 per share on Tuesday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币耶稣 "因美国逃税指控在西班牙被捕
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，一名被称为 "比特币耶稣 "的比特币早期投资者在西班牙被捕，美国指控他逃税至少 4800 万美元。【原文：An early investor in bitcoins dubbed the "Bitcoin Jesus" has been arrested in Spain on U.S. charges that he evaded paying at least $48 million in taxes, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 解说员：美国对大麻的改变将如何帮助大麻公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国司法部正着手将吸食大麻定为不那么严重的联邦罪行，建议将大麻重新归类为与含可待因的泰诺类似的药物，而不是海洛因。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department is moving to make marijuana use a less serious federal crime with a proposal to reclassify the drug as on par with Tylenol with codeine, rather than heroin, according to sources.】

item.title: 澳大利亚零售商伍尔沃斯将斥资 3.03 亿澳元出售 Endeavour 集团股份
item.description: 澳大利亚零售商伍尔沃斯（Woolworths）周三表示，将出售经营酒类商店和酒吧的奋进集团（Endeavour Group）5%的股份，所得收益为 4.68 亿澳元（3.0298 亿美元）。【原文：Australian retailer Woolworths on Wednesday said it was selling a 5% stake in Endeavour Group , which operates liquor stores and pubs, generating proceeds of A$468 million ($302.98 million).】

item.title: S3 表示，特朗普社交媒体公司股价上涨给做空者带来压力
item.description: 分析公司 S3 Partners 称，特朗普传媒与科技集团的做空者正感受到该公司股票近期反弹以及借入其股票成本提高所带来的热量。【原文：Short-sellers in Trump Media & Technology Group are feeling the heat from the recent rally in the company's stock and the higher cost of borrowing its shares, analytics firm S3 Partners said.】

item.title: 特朗普将其媒体公司的股份增至近 65
item.description: 据周二提交的一份文件显示，截至上周，唐纳德-特朗普在运营其社交媒体应用程序 Truth Social 的公司中的持股比例已增至近 65%。【原文：Donald Trump has raised his stake in the company that operates his social media app Truth Social to nearly 65% as of last week, according to a filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: IBM 赢得撤销对 BMC 16 亿美元软件合同的判决
item.description: 联邦上诉法院周二推翻了要求 IBM 向竞争对手 BMC 软件公司支付 16 亿美元的判决，因为法官发现 IBM 在 AT&T 公司不恰当地用自己的软件取代了 BMC 的大型机软件。【原文：A federal appeals court on Tuesday overturned a judgment requiring IBM to pay rival BMC Software $1.6 billion, after a judge found IBM improperly replaced BMC's mainframe software at AT&T with its own.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Polestar 第二次推迟发布第四季度财报
item.description: 瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar Automotive 公司发言人周二表示，该公司将第二次推迟公布 2023 年第四季度和全年财报。【原文：Swedish electric-vehicle maker Polestar Automotive will delay the publication of its fourth-quarter and full-year 2023 financial results for a second time, a spokesperson for the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 AMD 第一季度营收超出预期
item.description: 周二，芯片制造商 Advanced Micro Devices 第一季度营收小幅超出预期，原因是传统数据中心芯片需求不振，加上游戏芯片市场疲软。【原文：Chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices beat first-quarter revenue estimates by a small margin on Tuesday as tepid demand for chips used in traditional data centers added to weakness in the market for gaming chips.】

item.title: 马斯克解散特斯拉电动汽车充电团队，消费者被蒙在鼓里
item.description: 行业官员和分析师周二表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）突然决定解雇特斯拉电动汽车充电业务的员工，这让正准备为客户配备新电动汽车以使用特斯拉超级充电器网络的汽车制造商们大跌眼镜。【原文：Elon Musk's abrupt decision to lay off employees who ran Tesla's electric vehicle charging business blindsided automakers gearing up to equip new EVs for customers to use the Tesla Supercharger network, industry officials and analysts said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高乐氏因价格优势上调年度利润预期
item.description: Clorox 公司周二上调了全年盈利预期，此前该公司的季度盈利超出预期，主要得益于为抵消成本上升而采取的提价措施。【原文：Clorox Co raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday after beating quarterly earnings expectations, banking on effects of price hikes taken to offset escalating costs.】

item.title: 梦迪尔兹国际公司第一季度销售额和利润超出预期
item.description: 吉百利母公司蒙迪艾斯国际公司（Mondelez International）周二公布的第一季度销售额和利润超出市场预期，这得益于尽管通胀成本上升，但市场对其巧克力和咸饼干等高价产品的需求稳定。【原文：Cadbury parent Mondelez International beat market expectations for first-quarter sales and profit on Tuesday, helped by steady demand for its pricey products including chocolates and salty crackers, despite rising inflationary costs.】

item.title: 天然气价格持续低迷，切萨皮克能源公司季度利润不及预期
item.description: 天然气生产商切萨皮克能源公司（Chesapeake Energy Corp）周二公布的第一季度利润不及华尔街预期，原因是天然气价格持续走低拖累了该公司的业绩。【原文：Natural gas producer Chesapeake Energy Corp missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Tuesday as persistently low natural gas prices weighed down on the company's top-line results.】

item.title: 星巴克季度销售额意外下滑
item.description: 星巴克周二公布的第二季度可比销售额意外下降，原因是美国通胀疲软的消费者对星巴克咖啡的需求疲软。【原文：Starbucks on Tuesday reported a surprise decline in second-quarter comparable sales, as it grapples with weak demand for its coffees from inflation-weary consumers in the United States.】

item.title: 人工智能推动服务器需求增长，Super Micro 预计季度收入高于预期
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）周二预测第四季度营收将高于预期，因为该公司预计人工智能应用对其服务器的需求将持续增长。【原文：Super Micro Computer forecast fourth-quarter revenue above estimates on Tuesday as it expects continued demand for its servers used in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 由于广告支出强劲，Pinterest 预计季度营收高于预期
item.description: 周二，Pinterest 预测第二季度营收将高于华尔街预期，预计这将得益于图片分享平台广告支出的增长。【原文：Pinterest forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, expecting a boost from growing advertising spend on the image-sharing platform.】

item.title: 亚马逊预计季度营收低于预期
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周二预计，第二季度营收将低于华尔街预期，因为该公司预计，注重成本的企业对其云计算服务的支出将不温不火。【原文：Amazon.com forecast second-quarter revenue below Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, as it expects tepid spending from cost-conscious businesses on its cloud computing services.】

item.title: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行将暂停关闭地区分行的期限延长至 2027 年
item.description: 西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp）周三早些时候表示，该公司已将地区分行的关闭时间至少推迟到2027年，并将在未来两年内投资超过1.5亿澳元来改善这些分行的服务。【原文：Westpac Banking Corp has pushed back the closures of its regional branches until at least 2027 and will invest more than A$150 million over the next two years to improve services at these branches, the lender said early on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会恢复对宽带提供商的监督，取消 2017 年备忘录
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）周二表示，已终止与联邦贸易委员会签署的 2017 年谅解备忘录，该备忘录转移了对宽带服务提供商的部分监督。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) said on Tuesday it has terminated a 2017 memorandum of understanding with the Federal Trade Commission that had shifted some oversight of broadband service providers.】

item.title: 美国司法部采取行动将大麻重新归类为危险性较低的毒品，大麻股因此大涨
item.description: 在美国司法部（DoJ）采取行动将大麻重新归类为危险性较低的毒品后，大麻公司的股票在周二下午大涨。【原文：Shares of cannabis companies surged on Tuesday afternoon after the U.S. Department of Justice (DoJ) moved to reclassify marijuana as a less dangerous drug.】

item.title: 美国报纸起诉 OpenAI 侵犯人工智能训练版权
item.description: 周二，包括《纽约每日新闻》和《芝加哥论坛报》在内的一批报纸在纽约联邦法院起诉微软和 OpenAI，指控它们滥用记者的作品来训练其人工智能生成系统。【原文：A group of newspapers, including the New York Daily News and Chicago Tribune, sued Microsoft and OpenAI in New York federal court on Tuesday, accusing them of misusing reporters' work to train their generative artificial-intelligence systems.】

item.title: 美国劳工官员呼吁企业撤离中国新疆
item.description: 美国劳工部官员周二表示，由于存在强迫劳动问题，国际公司不能负责任地在新疆运营，应离开中国西部地区。【原文：International companies cannot responsibly operate in Xinjiang and should leave the western Chinese region due to forced labor concerns, a U.S. Labor Department official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 为美联储浅度宽松做准备，债券投资者走曲线中间道路
item.description: 由于美联储在本周的政策会议上决定维持利率不变，投资者押注美联储将推迟降息，且降息速度将慢于以往的宽松周期，因此债券投资者正有选择地在其投资组合中增加较长期限的债券。【原文：Bond investors are selectively adding longer-dated maturities to their portfolios on bets the Federal Reserve will delay cutting interest rates and reduce them at a slower pace than in previous easing cycles, starting with a decision to stand pat on rates at this week's policy meeting.】

item.title: 恩桥公司为其五大湖隧道项目选择承包商
item.description: 加拿大能源公司 Enbridge 周二发表声明称，该公司已聘请巴纳德建筑公司（Barnard Construction Company, Inc.【原文：Canadian energy company Enbridge has retained a joint venture partnership between Barnard Construction Company, Inc. and Civil and Building North America, Inc (CBNA). to construct the Great Lakes Tunnel in the Straits of Mackinac, the company said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 康卡斯特旗下的 Peacock 将在巴黎奥运会前提高流媒体价格
item.description: 孔雀（Peacock）是康卡斯特（Comcast）旗下 NBC 环球公司的流媒体服务，它将把其高级和高级附加计划的价格每月提高 2 美元，因为它希望从今年夏天巴黎奥运会的流媒体转播权中套现。【原文：Peacock, a Comcast-owned NBCUniversal's streaming service, will raise prices of its premium and premium plus plans by $2 per month, as it looks to cash in on its streaming rights to the Olympic Games in Paris this summer.】

item.title: 富国银行投资者批准高管薪酬，首席执行官强调风险控制
item.description: 富国银行股东周二以多数票通过了高管薪酬计划，包括将首席执行官查理-沙尔夫 2023 年的薪酬提高到 2900 万美元。【原文：Wells Fargo shareholders on Tuesday approved its plans for executive compensation with a majority vote, including hiking CEO Charlie Scharf's 2023 package to $29 million.】

item.title: 前谷歌员工称因抗议以色列合同而被解雇是非法的
item.description: Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌公司的一群员工向美国劳工委员会提出申诉，称这家科技公司因抗议与以色列政府签订云合同而非法解雇了他们。【原文：A group of workers at Alphabet Inc's Google have filed a complaint with a U.S. labor board claiming the tech company unlawfully fired them for protesting its cloud contract with the Israeli government.】

item.title: Ancora 在诺福克南方公司代理权争夺战中获得 ISS 支持，取得胜利
item.description: 本周二，著名代理咨询公司机构股东服务公司（ISS）建议股东选举该激进对冲基金的五名董事候选人，Ancora Holdings 在与诺福克南方公司的斗争中取得了第二次胜利。【原文：Ancora Holdings scored a second victory in its battle with Norfolk Southern when prominent proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) recommended on Tuesday that shareholders elect five of the activist hedge fund's director candidates.】

item.title: 贝莱德将推出由 PIF 支持的沙特投资平台
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周二表示，计划在沙特阿拉伯推出一个新的投资平台，由沙特主权财富基金公共投资基金（PIF）提供高达 50 亿美元的资金支持。【原文：The world's largest asset manager BlackRock said on Tuesday it plans to launch a new investment platform in Saudi Arabia, backed by up to $5 billion from Saudi sovereign wealth fund the Public Investment Fund (PIF).】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，标普全球正在权衡移动业务部门的各种选择
item.description: 三位知情人士告诉路透社，金融信息公司 S&P Global 正在权衡其移动业务的各种选择，包括全面出售。【原文：Financial information firm S&P Global is weighing options for its mobility business, including a full sale, three people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】
